Our client is a medical conglomerate with their own Health Assessment Centre in Hong Kong. They are looking for a part-time GP Doctor to join their team to handle daily clinic operations and conduct health assessments.

Responsibilities:
report to Medical Director
conduct patients' check-up and diagnostics
prescribing medication to patients accordingly, responsible for vaccination
provide professional and medical advice to in-coming patients
Requirements:
registered Medical Practitioner under the Medical Council of HKSAR
excellent communication in both Cantonese and English
fresh grad will also be considered

其實解決醫生數目不足好簡單

將醫生實習期由一年拉去五年，人工維持三萬
過到五年先俾牌照
而且有牌後要做多五年政府醫院先可以岀私立
只要一通過，每年多幾百個醫生用
十年後就多幾千個本地醫生不是夢
第一年houseman 1 就跟返依加啲實集野
houseman 2 3 4 5就當普通醫生用，儲下經驗，中間無岀錯先發牌

醫科咁複雜咁多野，一年經驗邊夠幫人，緊係儲夠五年先
醫生獲得更多經驗，市民又受惠，政府又用少左錢

最緊要係大粒果班利益唔會受損，細節可以慢慢微調，但大方向不變，透過增加實習期增加醫生人數
